Ask HN: How do you take breaks?
text: I've struggled even to break for lunch most days in my 17 year career as a dev. There are no natural intervals for me to break on and I fear losing context/momentum. I seem to always need to do "one more thing" and suddenly it's 5pm and I'm exhausted and generally unpleasant to be around.
